that's where people graduate when they go into their first tech job but if we think in terms of a couple of other

is extremely important to us as an organization and so internally what we did was we looked at ourselves and we're
we an organization that was actually being inclusive by intention and a
couple of things we did was we looked at our website and we thought oh we have really deficit-based language on our

terms of changing the face of tech as I mentioned before on average our students come in and $9,000 per year and they're
